title: Seen it three times
review: My family members keep wanting to go back. I've enjoyed it all three times. Christian Bale became a different person in the show. I forgot it was him and was totally into the character. Matt Damon's portrayal of Shelby also was excellent.

title: This will touch any entrepreneur heart
review: Beautifully told story of the love of a father and the determination of an entrepreneur.

title: A favorite of mine more relevant now than ever
review: This movie helped me through the Great Recession. His story, told so well, seems super applicable for the economic fallout of the pandemic.
